task.title: Timing the slideshow for individual slides
task.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn how to set timing to each individual slide.

taskbody.prereq:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
Steps:

step.cmd: Select Transitions and navigate to Timing.
Select After and type in the desired time.

result.p: After doing the steps for each individual slide, your slideshow will play automatically.
